# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a burner inserter at position(x=39.5 y=-79.5)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a burner inserter at position(x=41.5 y=-78.5)
-  Stone furnace (position x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of 
-  Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
-  Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0)
-  Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5) and pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5 y=-53.5)
Consists of 
-  Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)
-  Belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities have no fuel
-  Ensure that burner mining drills, stone furnaces, and boilers have a sufficient fuel supply to operate.
-  Regularly check the status of these entities to prevent downtime.

### Errors when entities are not connected
-  Ensure that steam engines are properly connected to the electricity network to function correctly.
-  Verify that pipe groups are correctly connected to boilers and steam engines.

### Errors when entities have no ingredients
-  Ensure that stone furnaces have the necessary ingredients to operate.
-  Regularly check the status of these entities to prevent downtime.

### Errors when entities are waiting for source items
-  Ensure that burner inserters have a sufficient source of items to operate.
-  Regularly check the status of these entities to prevent downtime.

# NAMESPACE
*No utility functions have been defined by the agent yet.*
*No important variables have been assigned yet.*
